nodes.text: Vulnerius was an astrological sign. It lasted from July 15 to August 3. At one point, it was stated that the stars were aligned and energy flew towards Vulns, and that it was time for Vulns to showcase their talents, cheer up, be more proactive, follow up on a hunch, welcome an opportunity to discuss pet projects with friends, show support for family members, update the wardrobe and give a chance to a new admirer. At that time, it was also said any economic obstacles in one's personal life would be removed and that a long-range goal was near at hand.

Vulnerius was introduced in Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a book published in 1993. In it, real-world months July and August were used as references for the astrological period. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
